divs: Sighting Detailsi would like it if someone can call me i have amazing pictures of this object but im not going to upload them until i can talk to someone but the pics i have are of that of a humane like man or women in the orb and he or she is holding a light in the right hand it is skinny body with a big head and big eyes and the day before this my son and mom seen a white orb in the same area my mom said that it was 3 round with orbs i also have pics of them but the best one i have is the violet orb with a human like thing in it
Summary: it was round violet orb with a man inside
trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
